dcterms:creator: N. Sunderhauf
W. D. Smart
M. Milford
G. F. Wyeth
dcterms:description: The Nordland dataset consists of images captured in different seasons, specifically summer and winter, used for evaluating visual place recognition methods under severe appearance changes.
dcterms:title: Nordland

dcterms:description: The synth-Nord dataset is a synthetic dataset created from the Nordland dataset, designed to simulate severe viewpoint changes by cropping specific parts of the images.
dcterms:title: synth-Nord

dcterms:creator: N. Sunderhauf
W. D. Smart
M. Milford
G. F. Wyeth
dcterms:description: The Gardens Point dataset consists of images captured during day and night traverses, used to evaluate visual place recognition methods under varying lighting conditions.
dcterms:title: Gardens Point (GP)

dcterms:creator: C. Li
W. Siu
dcterms:description: The UA dataset was collected by a mobile robot on the campus of the University of Alberta, featuring images captured during day and evening traverses, with severe condition variations and slight viewpoint changes.
dcterms:title: UA

dcterms:creator: Z. Chen
G. F. Wyeth
M. Milford
dcterms:description: The Berlin A100 dataset consists of images captured along the same route under varying conditions, including medium appearance and viewpoint changes, and variations due to dynamic vehicles.
dcterms:title: Berlin A100
